poem:
Title: "On the Teeter-totter of Hope"

In the grey dawn of uncertainty, 
Hamas rests on the fulcrum of decision,
History's pages turning, a ceasefire in conception.
Meanwhile, the hour passes in Gaza, in Tel Aviv, 
Tick-tock, the clock of compromise pulses, 
Promises springing forth like pale shoots of hope.
Tomorrow's sun may unveil peace, or pain,
Such is the pendulum of nations.
